name: Deviled Eggs
instructions:
1) Boil eggs
2) Peel eggs and  slice them in a half removing the yolks to a medium bowl, and placing the whites on a serving platter
3) Mash the yolks using a fork
4) Add mayonnaise, vinegar, mustard, salt, pepper, onion and parsley
5) Evenly distrubute the yolk mixture into the egg whites
6) Sprinkle with paprika and serve
Note: Add the ingredients with no predetermined amount as you like.
additionalInfo: Tried this for the first time in a friends house. I have to say I am not a big fan of eggs but this eggs are amazing! This recipe I am posting was actully adapted from foodnetwork.com
